page.title: 08Interviewing A Farm Worker
page.content: My Grandad told me that when he worked on a farm there were{forty-four men to a field and{four}men to a plough. This meant there were{twenty- {two}horses per field. My grandad worked for{forty-seven years on{twelve}different farms. On Worlaby Farm they used to have {200}cows,{100}pigs,{100}fat stock and {200}sheep.They had{twenty-four}working horses,{ten}mares and foals and{six riding ponies.The farm covered{500 acres.
